changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `iam_oauth2_registered_client` ( `id` bigint AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '自增主键' PRIMARY KEY, `client_id` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `client_id_issued_at` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, `client_secret` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `client_secret_expires_at` timestamp DEFAULT NULL, `client_name` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `client_authentication_methods` varchar(1000) NOT NULL, `authorization_grant_types` varchar(1000) NOT NULL, `redirect_uris` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `scopes` varchar(1000) NOT NULL, `client_settings` varchar(2000) NOT NULL, `token_settings` varchar(2000) NOT NULL ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET = utf8 COMMENT ='客户端表';
